backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining shop and clothing item types, search and detail queries, item photo storage, and shop/item initialization and update logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI update request to SearchPage.tsx and listing related components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with three routes under AppLayout and provides the router via RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/aura/AppLayout.t: Root layout with header, footer, outlet, and automatic backend shop initialization on mount.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemCard.ts: Item card showing photo, attributes, price, and shop count with image fallback and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/aura/ItemDetailD: Detailed item dialog showing full info, shop list, photo handling, and image upload with immediate preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating a backend actor per-identity with query invalidation when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuraQueries.ts: React Query hooks that call backend actor methods for listing categories, searching items, fetching item details, shop counts, and uploading photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and utility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CategorySelectionPage: Page that loads categories and displays selectable cards for navigating to item search.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays search results for clothing items with filters, loading/error states, and item detail dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Form page for entering item search filters and navigating to results based on category.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utility that normalizes item photo paths into safe, consistent URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, goals, issues, and feature list for building the AURA fashion discovery app with Bangalore shop data.
